abilities.name: Bounding Strides
abilities.description: Varghulfs leap and bound across the battlefield with uncanny bestial agility.
abilities.effect: This unit can pass across terrain features as if it had Fly.

abilities.name: Victory Feast
abilities.description: A Varghulf rampages through the enemy's ranks at will, its wounds sealing with unholy rapidity as it guzzles the flesh of the savaged foe.
abilities.effect:
If any models were slain by this unit this turn:
• Heal (D6) this unit.
• This unit can immediately use the 'Retreat' ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.
